import {Tabs } from 'nextra/components'

# Getting Started

<Tabs items={['macos', 'win']}>
<Tabs.Tab>

## WezTerm

```shell
brew install --cask wezterm
vim ~/.weazterm.lua
```

copy [.wezterm.lua](https://devenv.mjstudio.net/env/wezterm) into ~/.wezterm.lua

## Git

- [macos](https://git-scm.com/downloads/mac)

## Plugins

```shell
brew tap laishulu/homebrew
brew install macism
brew install jesseduffield/lazygit/lazygit
brew install lazygit ripgrep fd figlet corepack bat neovim
```

## Lazyvim

```shell
rm -rf ~/.config.nvim
git clone https://github.com/mym0404/nvim ~/.config/nvim
```

</Tabs.Tab>
<Tabs.Tab>

## Choco

```shell
Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))
choco feature enable -n allowGlobalConfirmation

# Install Runtimes
choco install -y git nodejs fz fneovim ripgrep wget fd unzip gzip mingw make lazygit figlet bat corepack
```

## Warp

- [downloads](https://www.warp.dev/)

</Tabs.Tab>

</Tabs>

## Claude

```shell
npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
# uv
# On macOS and Linux.
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh

# Clone and install from source
git clone https://github.com/Maciek-roboblog/Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor.git
cd Claude-Code-Usage-Monitor
uv tool install .

# Run from anywhere
claude-monitor
```

## Gemini

```shell
npx https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli
```

## Font

- [Jetbrains Mono Hangul Nerd](https://github.com/Jhyub/JetBrainsMonoHangul/releases/download/20220606/JetBrainsMonoNerdFontsHangul-20220606.zip) 
- [Hack Nerd Font](https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/download/v3.4.0/Hack.zip)
- [D2 Coding Nerd](https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/download/v3.4.0/D2Coding.zip)

## Install `zsh` theme `lambda-gitster` from my fork

```sh
git clone https://github.com/mym0404/lambda-gitster.git
cd lambda-gitster
cp lambda-gitster.zsh-theme ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/themes
```

## Apple Development

### xcode-build-server

```shell
brew install xcode-build-server
```
